name: EchoRewards – Referral Plugin for WooCommerce to Setup Your Refer a Friend Program
author: EchoRewards

sections.description:
Create your customer referral program with the ideal refer a friend plugin for WordPress. With EchoRewards, automate customer rewards and easily add a refer a friend program to your WooCommerce store. Running a customer referral campaign is no longer a hassle!

🎉 Unlock the Magic of Mutual Discounts 🎉

With EchoRewards, your customers can easily share exclusive coupons with their friends and family. When someone redeems a coupon, not only do they receive a special discount, but the person who shared it also gets rewarded. It’s a win-win for everyone involved! 😍

Welcome to the new and better way of sharing incentives among your customers. EchoRewards organically turns your customers into affiliates and increases customer acquisition instantly. 🚀

EchoRewards Refer a Friend Plugin Helps you Achieve:

  • Increased Customer Acquisition: People are more likely to try a new product or service when recommended by someone they trust. This WooCommerce coupon plugin turns your customer base into a sales force.
  • Reduced Marketing Costs: Customer-to-customer referrals can reduce the cost of acquiring new customers, as compared to traditional advertising channels.
  • Enhanced Customer Loyalty: Offering referral rewards shows appreciation, potentially increasing customer retention.
  • Trackable Marketing: You can track which customers provide the most referrals and which channels are most effective.

✨ Try Live Demo | ⚡ Get the Premium Version

🔝 EchoRewards Free Features

👥 Referral Coupons: Every customer gets their unique referral coupon to share with friends, family, and social networks. Once the coupon is used, the referrer and the friend receive a discount, fostering community and excitement.

💰 Discount Amount Customization: Customize the discount amount that a referrer or referee gets from a successful referral.

🛒 Referral Program Tab on WooCommerce: Raise awareness about your referral program by enabling the Referral Program Tab on WooCommerce. Your customers can learn about your program and also sign up to avail their benefits.

📩 Email Notifications: Referrers receive email notifications containing reward coupons when a friend uses a referral coupon and completes an order.

🔍 Invitation Tracking: Referrers can easily track the progress of their shared coupon from their “My Account” page.

📱 Social Sharing: With social sharing users can effortlessly share referral coupons through Facebook and Twitter, enhancing program visibility.

📨 Email Invitation: Referrers can share their referral code through email, ensuring a swift way of sharing benefits among friends.

📊 Intuitive Admin Dashboard: Get an intuitive dashboard to customize your referral program settings including referral program status, referral discount amount, referee discount amount, etc.

✨ Try Live Demo | ⚡ Get the Premium Version

👑 EchoRewards Pro Features

💳 Customize Discount Type: Customize your referral incentives from percentage discounts to fixed amounts.

👥 Referrer Status Customization: Easily decide on the customers eligible for the referral program. If you enable this feature, the referrer will require at least one order in your store before he can refer others.

🎈 Floating Referral Widget: This is a game change for your business! You can easily notify your site, visitors, about your referral program through a floating widget which will attract more customers.

🔒 Discount Capping: Maintain control over your discounts with the option to set a discount capping, ensuring that your referral program remains within your budget.

🔏 Coupon Privacy: Decide whether only logged-in or all customers will be allowed to apply referral coupon during purchase.

⌛ Reward Coupon Validity: Set a validity for how long the reward coupon will be valid.

💰 Set Minimum Purchase Amount: Set the minimum amount of purchase to avail a referral coupon benefit.

🏷️ Referral Coupon Prefix: Add a unique coupon prefix to give your referral program a more personalized feel.

🛍️ Restrict Coupons for Specific Products: Choose the products where you can redeem the coupons.

🔍 Include/Exclude Products & Categories: Customize your referral program by selecting specific products or categories to be included or excluded.

📧 Customize Rewards Email: You can customize the reward email as you wish from the plugin settings (subject, heading, and description).

🌐 Extended Social Sharing Options: Allow customers to effortlessly spread the word across 14 social network channels.

📊 Advanced Reporting & Analytics: Monitor referral statistics including the most active referrer, new customer acquisition, and total generated revenue from the referral program. Take proactive decisions based on your program’s performance and enhance your future marketing efforts.

✨ Try Live Demo | ⚡ Get the Premium Version

⚡ Floating Referral Widget to Promote Your Customer Referral Program

Enhance your referral program’s visibility with the built-in Floating Referral Widget, a dynamic tool that effortlessly promotes your referral program to visitors. This eye-catching widget remains visible as users navigate your site, ensuring maximum exposure and engagement. By seamlessly integrating into the user experience, the Floating Referral Widget captivates attention and drives participation, ultimately boosting referral program awareness and conversions. 🚀

So, what are you waiting for? Enhance your WooCommerce store, boost customer engagement, and watch your sales soar with EchoRewards. Let’s create a more rewarding shopping experience for your customers together!

✨ Try Live Demo | ⚡ Get the Premium Version

Privacy Policy

EchoRewards uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Appsero SDK does not gather any data by default. The SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how Appsero collects and uses this data.
sections.installation:
1. Navigate to WordPress Dashboard>Plugins>Add New. Search “EchoRewards” and activate the plugin.
  2. Make sure that WooCommerce is installed and activated on your site.
  3. Access the plugin settings from Marketing>EchoRewards.
  4. Update your referral and reward settings and begin your referral program journey!
sections.faq:
Do I need to know any programming language for using this plugin?

No coding knowledge is required for using this plugin.

How do I create a refer a friend program in WooCommerce?

The easiest way to create a refer a friend referral program in WooCommerce is through the EchoRewards plugin. Install and activate the plugin, customize the referral settings and boost your sales.

Where do I contact for support?

Please use the official WordPress support forum to report your issues.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3 – 03 Apr 2024

  • Improvement: When admin makes any changes to the referral coupon setting, the changes will be applied to all the referral coupons

1.1.2 – 02 Apr 2024

  • Improvement: Updated author url

1.1.1 – 31 Mar 2024

  • Fix: Fixed an issue within Appsero that caused an error while installing the plugin

1.1.0 – 31 Mar 2024

  • New (Referrer Status): Easily decide on the customers eligible for the referral program
  • New (Coupon Usage Criteria): Control the usage of coupons for customers
  • New (Minimum Purchase Amount for Referral & Reward Coupons): Set the minimum amount that needs to be purchased or added in the cart to apply coupon
  • New(Coupon Prefix): Create referral coupons with your branding using coupon prefix
  • New(Floating Widget): Let the customers know about the referral program using floating widget which is visible on your website
  • New(Exclude/Include WooCommerce Products & Categories): Take control of where the referral & reward coupons can be applied
  • New(Reward Coupon Validity & Usage Limit): Control the validity and usage limit of the reward coupons
  • New: Integrated Appsero SDK
  • Fix: Fixed several issues with the referral & reward coupons
  • Improvement: Improved overall performance

1.0.0 – 19 Mar 2024

  • Initial Release

By tahleelwp on April 3, 2024

Does what it says. Easy to setup a referral program. The free version is kind of restricted though.
